subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Russia, the world champion, announced its 23-man Olympic roster, a team led by the high-powered N.H.L. forwards Alex Ovechkin, Evgeni Malkin and Ilya Kovalchuk.
snippet: Russia, the world champion, announced its 23-man Olympic roster, a team led by the high-powered N.H.L. forwards Alex Ovechkin, Evgeni Malkin and Ilya Kovalchuk.
